DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial compare two different treatment fit patient head neck cancer : All patient give induction-chemotherapy ( docetaxel , cisplatin , 5-FU ) . Subsequently patient randomise two group : - The first group receive neo-adjuvant chemotherapy ( 'high ' dose cisplatin ) conventional radiotherapy - The second group receive neo-adjuvant chemotherapy ( 'low ' dose cisplatin ) accelerate radiotherapy .
DOC.brief_title: TPF Induction With Concomitant Chemoradiation Treat Patients With Head Neck Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Induction Chemotherapy TPF ( arm A B ) : Docetaxel 75 mg/m2 iv day 1 , Cisplatin 75 mg/ m2 iv day 1 , 5-FU 750 mg/ m2/day iv continuous infusion ( Hickman port cath ) day 1-5 ; prophylactic G-CSF This cycle repeat every 21 day maximum 4 cycle . Clinical evaluation cycle radiological evaluation 2 cycle take place . In case PD SD ( 2 cycle ) minor response ( decrease measurable disease baseline ) concomitant chemoradiotherapy start per protocol . Surgery The investigator centre decide neck surgery residual tumor
